title: God-level Store Manager - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Slice of Life
tags: Alternate World   Arrogant Characters   Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Comedic Undertone   Cultivation   Dense Protagonist   Game Elements   Hiding True Abilities   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Late Romance   Lazy Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Money Grubber   Overpowered Protagonist   Slow Romance   Store Owner   System Administrator   Transmigration   Unique Cultivation Technique   World Tree
author: Li Tian Wang Liang
description:
In Tianlan Continent, there is a magic store called Origin Mall.

The Coke here can make people full of vitality in an instant; the spicy bars here can make people fight one another; the games here can make people improve their cultivation; the novels here can make people understand profound techniques.

Here there are infinite goods to choose from, including leisure, entertainment, dining, and training.

Oh, by the way, remember one thing. Donâ€™t cause trouble in the store, because the owner is very strong.>
